title: Eames Style Soft Pad Office Chair EA208
body: Created in the year 1969 by Charles Eames, the soft pad chairs are similar to the design of the Aluminum Group, but their sewn-in cushions are a distinguishing feature compared to the slender profiles of the aluminum. Their luxuriant upholstery ensures soft seating comfort The chairs adapt to the body of the sitter and provide extraordinary comfort. The Eames Soft Pad Office Chair EA208 is suitable for numerous purposes- in the office, in conference and reception areas, but also at home.
